title: Science Knowledge Acquisition Strategies Through VR-Based Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and mobile device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Science knowledge enhancement program for current practitioners using smartphone-based VR learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply procedural knowledge (experimental manipulation skills) with over 80% accuracy in a mobile VR environment.
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in declarative knowledge (understanding of scientific concepts) assessments after VR-based learning.
Learners can independently operate VR microlearning modules even in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
